snippet.title: Monster Hunter Wilds Interview with Art Director Kaname Fujioka | PC Gaming Show: Most Wanted 2024
snippet.description:
We tracked down Monster Hunter Wilds’ art director Kaname Fujioka in New York, to discuss his approach to designing the monsters for Capcom’s wildly anticipated action game. 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2246340/Monster_Hunter_Wilds/
https://www.pcgamer.com

We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
